FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_BODY_TEXT_1: We're a team of passionate dog lovers dedicated to providing safe, reliable walks for your furry friends.
FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_BODY_TEXT_2: Our walkers are thoroughly vetted, insured, and trained in positive reinforcement techniques.
FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_BODY_TEXT_3: Your pup's happiness and wellbeing are our top priorities.
FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_BODY_TEXT_4: Book a walk today and give your dog the exercise and attention they deserve!
LANDING_PAGE_ANNOUNCEMENT_TEXT: Introducing the ultimate dog walking companion app!
LANDING_PAGE_HERO_TEXT: Walk This Way: Your Furry Friend's Delight
LANDING_PAGE_SUB_HERO_TEXT: Revolutionizing the way you explore the great outdoors with your canine pal. Fetch adventure, stay connected, and create lasting memories.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Our app connects you with experienced, vetted dog walkers in your neighborhood who will treat your furry friend like family.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Book walks on your schedule - one-time, recurring, or last-minute. Our walkers are ready when you need them.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Track your pup's walk with GPS and receive photos and updates throughout their adventure.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Pay easily and securely through the app using your preferred payment method.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Read detailed profiles about each walker's experience, training, and reviews from other pet parents.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Specify your dog's needs - senior care, medication administration, extra playtime, and more - so we can match you perfectly.
HERO_TEXT_BEFORE_TITLE: Unleash the joy of walking your furry friend!
HERO_SUBTITLE: Book trusted dog walkers in your neighborhood with just a few taps.
CONTACT_FORM_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get in Touch for Dog Walking Services
CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: We'll take your furry friend for a fun and safe walk!
STARTER_TEMPLATE_APPLICATION_NAME: Bark Avenue: Your Pooch's Personal Guide
PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Dog Walking App
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: How do I schedule a dog walker?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Scheduling a dog walker is easy! Just open the app, select your preferred date and time, and a nearby walker will be assigned to you.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: What if I need to cancel or reschedule?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: You can cancel or reschedule your walk up to 2 hours before the scheduled time with no fees. Any changes within 2 hours may incur a small fee.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Are the dog walkers background checked?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Yes, all our dog walkers undergo a comprehensive background check and training before being approved to use the app.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: How much does the service cost?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Pricing is based on walk duration and starts at $10 for a 30 minute walk. Longer walks and additional services like pet sitting cost more.
CTA_TITLE: Unleash the Adventure: Your Dog's New Best Friend
CTA_BODY: Say goodbye to the hassle of walking your furry companion alone. Our app connects you with trusted, pet-loving walkers in your neighborhood who'll treat your pup like family.
CTA_SUBTITLE: Convenient, Reliable, and Tailored to Your Dog's Needs
CTA_CONTENT_SUBTITLE: Fetch the Perfect Walk for Your Pooch
FAQ_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Dog Walking App
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Everything you need to know about using our convenient dog walking service.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: How do I book a dog walker?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Booking a dog walker through our app is easy! Simply open the app, select your preferred date and time, and a walker in your area will be assigned to you.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: What are your walker screening processes?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: We have a rigorous screening process for all our dog walkers including background checks, reference checks, and practical evaluations to ensure the safety of your furry friends.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: How will I know when the walker has arrived?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: You'll receive a notification through the app when your walker is on their way and again when they arrive at your home to pick up your dog.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: What if I need to cancel or reschedule a walk?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: You can cancel or reschedule walks through the app up to 2 hours before the scheduled start time. Any changes after that may be subject to fees.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Is there any way to track my dog's walk?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Yes, our walkers use GPS tracking so you can see the route they took with your dog in real-time through the app's map feature.
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Book trusted and insured dog walkers in your neighborhood with just a few taps.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Tailor your dog's walk to their unique needs - distance, duration, frequency and more.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Get notifications with photos when your pup is picked up and dropped off after their walk.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_FOOTER_CONTENT: At Bark Avenue, we're dedicated to providing safe, reliable dog walking services for your furry companions. Our team of experienced and caring dog walkers will ensure your pup gets the exercise and attention they need while you're away. Join the pack today!
NEWSLETTER_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Unleash Convenience: Subscribe to Our Pack!
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Hear from satisfied pet owners who love our dog walking service
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: The walkers from this app are simply the best! My dog is always happy and tired after their walks. Highly recommend!
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: I travel a lot for work, so having reliable dog walkers I can book through this app is a lifesaver. My pup is in great hands!
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As a senior, I really appreciate the convenience and safety this dog walking app provides. The walkers are pros and I don't have to worry.

PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_6: Earth-friendly bags for cleaning up after pets
